```{r}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
join_df <- house_elections %>%
              left_join(committees, by=c("state"= "cmte_state"))
join_df
```

```{r}
fec_df<- as.tbl(house_elections) %>%
      select(state, candidate_name, party, primary_votes, ge_winner)
fec_df
```
